ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:52:56 [Issue ID 4000-37858] urn:comicvine:4000-37858 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 14:00:20. [Issue ID 53708]
ComicInfo.Summary:
While chasing down the supply chain of a designer drug in Hong Kong, Gilad saves Bloodshot's life from some surprisingly well-prepared ninja. But the mystery becomes a whole lot clearer when the trail of evidence leads them to a subsidiary of Iwatsu Industries-- the company that created Bloodshot!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-15-death-by-design/4000-37858/
ComicInfo.Title: Death by Design
